BH-022. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet
BH-022. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet

Vase shape when closed. Sentimental painting of "A Faithful Guardian," scene of a raft bearing a sitting but alert St. Bernard dog and a small boy seated between his paws and holding on to the dog's furry chest, looking frightened. Field's Stationery, West Somerville, Massachusetts. Printer: Leroy, Inc., Union City, N.J.
